doctor.name: Dr. Nilima Jafrin
doctor.workplace: Bangladesh Institute of Tropical and Infectious Diseases
doctor.info: Dr. Nilima Jafrin is a Gynecologist in Chittagong. Her qualification is MBBS, BCS (Health), M.Phil (Physiology), FCPS (OBGYN). She is a Assistant Professor, Gynecology at Bangladesh Institute of Tropical and Infectious Diseases. She regularly provides treatment to her patients at Doctors Lab, Chittagong. Practicing hour of Dr. Nilima Jafrin at Doctors Lab, Chittagong is Unknown. Please call to know visiting hour.

chamber.address: 131, KB Fazlul Kader Road, Probortok More, Panchlaish, Chattogram
chamber.visitingTime: Unknown. Please call to know visiting hour

doctor.name: Dr. Shiuly Chakma
doctor.info: Dr. Shiuly Chakma is a Gynecologist in Chittagong. Her qualification is MBBS, DGO. She is working as a Gynecology & Obstetrics Specialist doctor in Chattogram Maa-O-Shishu Hospital Medical College. She regularly provides treatment to her patients at Qrex Diagnostic & Consultation Centre, Chittagong. Practicing hour of Dr. Shiuly Chakma at Qrex Diagnostic & Consultation Centre, Chittagong is 7pm to 9pm (Sat, Mon & Wed).

chamber.address: Seaman Hostel Gate, Saltgola Crossing, EPZ, Chattogram
